channel.title: brother on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in brother on Barefoot Rob

item.title: How to set the server key on Brother scanner
mt3
item.description: 16:35 Thursday 01 February 2018 JST Today I did 1.5 hours of live stream to get about 1 second of new video added to Dragonframe’s ongoing take. In the foreground on the left, the cutter cut a piece (I decided to redo about 7 frames to get his cut lined up properly) which the gluer glued into place. In the foreground on the right, the 8th rib is being put into place.

item.title: Met Lin's aunt and uncle 2
item.description: 16:33 Sunday 17 December 2017 -02 Met A-ni-su and A-ni-su-mei at their restaurant and then went to a bbq party on the other side of town. I chatted with 三木（みき）in English, and his friend talked about the organization whose name includes a pronunciation pun on the phrase “innovate yourself”
